mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_content, DATE_FORMAT(c.comment_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS comment_time, u.realname FROM resource_comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.resource_id = #{resourceId} ORDER BY c.comment_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resource_comment (id, comment_content, user_id, resource_id, comment_time) VALUES (#{id},#{commentContent},#{userId}, #{resourceId}, #{commentTime})
